message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,500. It's in excellent condition and I believe it will be a great asset for you.  What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. Can you consider that?

Bob, I appreciate your interest, but $9,500 is just too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit, but I need to get closer to $11,000. How about we meet in the middle at $10,250?  Let's make this deal work.
I'm still a bit short on budget, so I'm willing to go up to $9,800. Can you meet me there?

Bob, I understand you're working with a budget, but $9,800 just doesn't work for me. I'm willing to go a little lower, but $10,000 is my absolute bottom line. If we can agree on that, we can close the deal.
I'm still a bit short, but I'm willing to go up to $9,500. Can you meet me there?
